plot: Allison meets an FBI profiler she admires, but her visions start to involve him.

Allison dreams about a serial killer, Richard Gomez, against whom charges had been dropped some years before when a key piece of evidence disappeared. The FBI agent in charge of that case, Edward Cooper, is now in Phoenix tracking a serial killer that he believes has moved there but Allison's dreams suggest that Gomez may be responsible. When she learns that Gomez was killed many years before in a cheap motel in Mexico, her dreams also reveals his killer's identity. Joe meanwhile has become concerned at Marie's interest in watching a static-filled TV screen.—garykmcd
